text: "It's a Long Way to the Top (If You Wanna Rock 'n' Roll)" is a 1975 song by Australian hard rock band AC/DC. It is from their album T.N.T.. It was released in Australia and New Zealand on 8 December 1975. It went to number 9 in Australia. ==References== Category:1975 songs Category:AC/DC songs Category:Mot√∂rhead songs Category:John Farnham songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: It's a Long Way to the Top (If You Wanna Rock 'n' Roll)
